pageProps.title: Big Blue Hotel | Amaliapolis
pageProps.description: Big Blue Hotel is located in Amaliapolis Greece. Here are some information about Amaliapolis, a beautiful seaside village in Central Greece. Also, Big Blue Hotel suggests some tours in Magnesia such as Volos, Almyros, Pelion, the two Monasteries of Panagia Xenia, and cruises to the Sporades Islands.
